6.Answer: When a Manager attends a residential programme as a participant or as a faculty member, and when the programme fees cover his boarding and lodging, course Travel Expense rates shall be applicable. When a Manager attends a residential programme on a non-residential basis, the individual may claim 50% of the course Travel Expense applicable to his Grade.If a Manager attends a residential programme where the course fee is only for teaching material,  and boarding shall be on his/her own account, normal Travel Expense rates shall apply.

17.Answer:
When a Manager attends a residential programme as a participant or as a faculty member, and when the programme fees cover his boarding and lodging, course Travel Expense rates shall be applicable. 
When a Manager attends a residential programme on a non-residential basis, the individual may claim 50% of the course Travel Expense applicable to his Grade.

If a Manager attends a residential programme where the course fee is only for teaching material,  and boarding shall be on his/her own account, normal Travel Expense rates shall apply.
